data.title: Manhunter
data.description: Jake finds his authority tested and thunder stolen by a beat-walking Holt amid a manhunt. Amy turns to Rosa for support during a personal crisis.

data.title: Captain Kim
data.description: When an interim captain arrives at the Nine-Nine, Jake sets out to prove she's way too good to be true. Boyle rebrands his image.

data.title: Pimemento
data.description: Adrian Pimento resurfaces with a "Finding Dory"-esque memory problem. Jake tries to keep a secret from Boyle. The squad attends a mandatory HR seminar.

data.title: The Jimmy Jab Games II
data.description: Jake revives the Jimmy Jab Games, with Boyle going full-on P.T. Barnum as host of the competition and Holt's timid new partner reluctantly joining in.

data.title: Debbie
data.description: The squad suspects an inside job when guns and cocaine connected to a notorious crime boss go missing from the Nine-Nine.

data.title: Trying
data.description: Time flies as Jake and Amy focus on their family plans. Holt bristles over his tedious new job. A tooth-wielding Hitchcock searches for his Cinderella.

data.title: Ding Dong
data.description: Holt risks his career by refusing to let his greatest nemesis have the last word. Boyle and Terry compete for Jake's tickets to an exclusive kid event.

data.title: The Takeback
data.description: The reappearance of Doug Judy lands Jake in hot water. Terry scrambles to replace Holt's treasured keepsake. The Nine-Nine gets a new vending machine.

data.title: Dillman
data.description: When an apparent prank destroys a key piece of evidence, Holt taps the best detective he knows to interrogate the squad and bring the culprit to justice.

data.title: Admiral Peralta
data.description: Jake doubles down on his daddy issues during a tense family reunion. Holt turns into a musical taskmaster over Terry's audition with the NYPD band.

data.title: Valloweaster
data.description: A pudgy pooch, handcuffs and various other disasters delay the crowning of the squad's newest Amazing Human/Genius in the annual Halloween Heist.

data.title: Ransom
data.description: Holt turns to Jake for help after a family member goes missing. Rosa battles Amy's ex for a coveted prize. Boyle and Terry team up on a business scheme.

data.title: Lights Out
data.description: Amy takes charge of the Nine-Nine during a citywide blackout, while Jake hits one snag after another as he races to her side.
